attributes.title: Loren I Lannister
attributes.season: Complete Guide to Westeros, Histories & Lore
mentioned: "The Field of Fire (Complete Guide to Westeros)"

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Loren's story is the same.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
[[File:Loren lannister.png|thumb|200px|King Loren I bends the knee]]
Loren Lannister was the last of the [[House Lannister|Lannister]] [[King of the Rock|Kings of the Rock]]. When [[Aegon I Targaryen|Aegon the Conqueror]] [[Wars of Conquest|invaded]] [[Westeros]], King Loren joined forces with [[Mern Gardener|Mern IX]], the [[King of the Reach|King]] of [[the Reach]], to face Aegon in battle.

However, Aegon unleashed his three [[dragons]], [[Vhagar]], [[Meraxes]] and [[Balerion]] the Black Dread against the combined might of the Kingdoms of the Reach and the Rock. Four thousand men perished, consumed in a "[[Field of Fire|field of fire]]," including King Mern. Seeing he had no chance of victory, King Loren bent the knee to Aegon and gave up his crown. He was named Lord Paramount of the [[Westerlands]] and [[Warden]] of the West.<ref>"[[The Field of Fire (Complete Guide to Westeros)]]"</ref><ref>"[[House Lannister (Complete Guide to Westeros)]]"</ref><ref>"[[House Tyrell (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
